title: The Steerage
description: image contained in copies of 291, a limited edition magazine of prints, photographs, poetry, and music.  Alfred Stieglitz, Paul B. Haviland and others, editors.  New York 1915-1916.  This photograph was contained in copy number 8, only this image from copies number 7 and 8 remain in the collection, all others were deaccessioned by action of the Accessions Committee, June 12, 1984.
